title: Astacus (the crayfish)
brief_description: The crayfish is examined as an example of an animal having an external skeleton; the function and structure of each individual part of the skeleton is studied. Detailed consideration is given to the male and female reproductive organs, the arterial system, the nervous system, and the process of feeding and digestion.
